channel.title: ISLANDS - A world of dungeons, islands, and creativity
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oujJABn.png[/img]
[size=14pt][COLOR=#008080][B]23 ACTIVELY PLAYING IN UNDER 24 HOURS[/B] - [I]Don't miss out![/I] SERVER LAUNCHED 4/16[/COLOR][/size]
[B]>>> [url=http://forum.islandsrsps.com/]http://forum.islandsrsps.com/[/url][/B] [I]Come join the fun guys! <3 <3 <3[/I]
[COLOR=#6699ff][B]Latest update summary:[/B][/COLOR] A couple of NEW PICTURES have been posted on the forums ^_^ Come and join the community early!
- [url=http://forum.islandsrsps.com/]FORUMS[/url] - [url=http://play.islandsrsps.com/]PLAY[/url] - [url=http://highscores.islandsrsps.com/]HIGHSCORES[/url]
For those of you who knew of or played my former server Shilo, [i]Islands[/i] is very similar in regards to play-style, but with new locations, monsters, and a better feel in general. The fact that everything I need is pretty much in the game areas I'm using, as opposed to spawning everything, makes for easier development, and therefore more updates more frequently. Those who know me or know my previous works know that I love old-schoolish gameplay with a very simplistic approach. I enjoy community based environments that are more close (figuratively and literally, as the playable areas in the server are close-quarters) and tight-knit than other servers, which is my goal for [i]Islands[/i].
[B]Media[/B]
[b]Initial media:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jOqHPIB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FNCHvXM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SC9yfbQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3VIMH5P.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2Kktvlu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vyv6mYG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qCqn4fE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7tkjRbN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2jZr5pk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8yP7qeA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R11uXIh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R9CvzNH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BUjziUD.png[/img]
[b]New media:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WXaQPRR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7AJgAoI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1CY0zQZ.png[/img]
[b]Content[/b] # All released skills working near 100%; includes all but Farming and Agility # Combat system works almost flawlessly, including auto-retaliation and aggression # Solid dialogue and quest systems, although quests are still in question # Very unique content and areas, based mostly (if not all) on islands and dungeons # Programmed with near-perfection in mind, so bugs and kinks in current content are pretty scarce # Community and goal oriented, geared more towards training and an economy than PKing # Huge opportunity for more unique, interesting, and fun updates
I'll update this topic as I go, although most things are already programmed. I started with a nearly scratch source and built almost everything myself, skills and other content included.
Please spread the word and keep this topic up top, you won't regret it. Thanks for reading!
[i]NOTE: This is a copy and paste of my old project thread. It will be updated as a better advertisement soon.[/i]

item.title: ISLANDS - A world of dungeons, islands, and creativity
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

This is what you can expect to see within the next month:

I’ve heard numerous complaints about there not being enough high level content, and with that I agree. Currently the server is geared more towards medium to low level players. I’ve got some plans for some more intuitive bosses, high-level mini-games, and adding onto some existing dungeons, and some new islands. This will be a basic overview of where we want to take the server in terms of future content.

The New Server
The New Server is a stability and content upgrade that will allow for us to code more in-depth things within the server.

The stability of the server will be greatly increased. No longer will you try to login and get a Login Flood error. The server will run much more smooth than before, and will have a lot less, if any, lag spikes. Hopefully, this will make your experience much more enjoyable when it comes to playing this server.

For example, the current NPC system only accounts for very basic changes and max hits. The new system will allow us to make NPCs have numerous attacks that could combine melee and magic damage or even ranged and magic damage for one attack. These NPCs would also have a better AI system than that of the just basic goblins that are standing around on Entrana. This will give us the chance to introduce some bosses that are actually challenging, creative, and different from what you may have seen before.

The new server will also include an in depth quest system to allow for cut scenes, instanced areas so that your character will be alone in a major quest battle with only friendly NPCs to aide you. The new quest system is user friendly, and will allow us to add quests a lot faster than we can now, and with much cleaner code.

If you’ve walked around the server and clicked objects, NPCs, or even Players for combat you’ll notice that it takes a few clicks which can be extremely annoying. This will not be the case on the upgraded server. Our new system has a type of event called a “coordinate event” which basically makes it so once your player clicks something it moves them to it and then preforms the action. Thankfully, this will get rid of that annoying and extremely irritating clicking issue on the server.

There will be a complete overhaul of the combat system. The new system will have much better formulas when it comes to calculating accuracy, max hit, and the defensive chance of hits. Armour and weapon bonuses will play a much greater roll than they do currently. My friend Brent and I have tested this system before about a year ago, and even asked one of our friends who was extremely PvP and PvE oriented on Runescape how he felt about the system. He felt it was about 90% + accurate to that of Runescape. With just a bit more tweaking we’ll be able to make it more accurate and everyone will be happy.

Miscellania and Etceteria
I have a plan to introduce Miscellania and Etceteria as the next large island on the server. This will serve as the Fremmenik area of the game. There will be a quest in which you aide the Fremmeniks in an oncoming assault from sea trolls. Finishing this said quest will give access to a shop which sells better armour up to Rune, and even the Fremmenik helmets that everyone loves. I’ve also got plans for a second dungeon on this island that utilizes the Taverly dungeon map giving the players Black dragons, Black Demons, and Hell hounds. There will even be a ship to take you over to Waterbirth Island to take on the Dagganoths and fight your way to the Dagganoth Kings.

The Entrana Dungeon
Currently the stepping stones in the Entrana dungeon do not allow you to cross them. This will be fixed once boots of lightness are introduced from a boss in the game. When wearing the boots you’ll be able to cross the stepping stones into the rest of the dungeon. There you will find the great metal dragons which will drop the fabled dragon platelegs, and dragon medium helmet. These dragons will also have other drops that are quite sought after and wanted by many players on the server.

TzHaar
I’ve been wanting to add this for awhile now, but with our current systems on the main server it’s just not possible for me to add what I’d like to. When the new server is released TzHaar will come out in full with The Fight Caves and the Fight Pits as two mini-games. This will allow for some fun PvP amongst the players, and access to the fire cape.The Fight Caves will not be 63 waves, it’ll be a shortened version of, or so I’m thinking, around 30 waves with a bumped up difficulty.There will be shops in TzHaar allowing for buying Tokkul and other gems, and even some Runes.

Conclusion
This is what we’ve got planned at the moment, and we’re hoping to get it out to you as soon as possible. Some of these updates will be necessary after the new server has gone into place, and others before that to tide you over with some content. I hope you’ve enjoyed reading about what the plans for the next month or so. We’re going to be trying harder and harder to get these updates out, and hopefully we’ll gain some more players in the process. Don’t get bored and quit on us now. We’ve got a lot planned. ;D

Sincerely,
The Islands Development Team

Read full topic

item.title: ISLANDS - A world of dungeons, islands, and creativity
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Well everybody, I know you’ve all been extremely patient in awaiting some updates and they’re coming this week! I’m going to give a brief overview of what you can expect to see this week.

A New Dungeons
The new up incoming dungeon is geared towards low and medium leveled players. It’s basically a carbon copy of the Varrock Dungeon in Runescape, but relocated on Entrana. This dungeon servers for more purpose than just training, it’ll allow you to get a piece of a key to gain access to Slayer Tower.

Everyone who ever made a pure account on Runescape remembers the tunnel of experiments. Well you can expect to see that here as a decent training area, and a way to gain access to slayer tower.

Slayer News:
You can expect to see a short slayer quest this week with a reward of not only slayer experience, but access to slayer tower and all of monsters within, with their respective drops of course. So you’ll have the chance to work towards items such as armoured boots, more rune items, and of course the lustrous abyssal whip.

Bug Fixes and Small Additions
As seen in my patch notes for yesterday these updates will go live at the same time as the above updates.

  1. Got my client loading higher revision items, such as skill capes, on the main server.
  2. The server will now add higher revision items to the correct equipment slots.
  3. Sorted out a bunch of different NPCs having no animations.
  4. Added cosmic talisman to Hill Giants.
  5. Added Unicorns on Entrana with a 100% drop of Unicorn Horns.
  6. Added Red Spiders near the entrance of the Entrana Dungeon. These drop Red Spiders’ Eggs 75% of the time.
  7. Added Beginner shops on Entrana.

I’m going to try to focus on weekly updates. This means that some may be rather large, and others primarily bug fixes. I want this server to succeed more than anything. So I’m hoping you’ll all stick around with us as we continue to update the server making it more and more enjoyable.

Na1FTDK.png774×536



Read full topic

item.title: ISLANDS - A world of dungeons, islands, and creativity
item.dc:creator: @Beast1233 Beast1233
item.description:
@Beast1233 wrote:

Usually I only play on 06 servers but this one looks intriguing. A few questions come to mind:

The graphics look like they are from 06-07era. Does this mean the items will be as well?
On the same note, do the skills include summoning and dungeonering?
Are monster drops different from runescape?
Is there going to be a web client and highscores?
Are there going to be guilds?
If the world is different from runescape, does this mean you are doing your own quests or tinkering with old ones to fit the server?

Read full topic
